players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure this doesn't happen again."
You: "Let's focus on finding out who the mafioso is, rather than just trying to avoid death. We need to gather information and work together to figure this out."
Diana: "I agree with Alice, we should focus on identifying the mafioso to ensure everyone's safety. Let's share any suspicious information we may have and work together as a team."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure this doesn't happen again."
Alice: "Let's focus on finding out who the mafioso is, rather than just trying to avoid death. We need to gather information and work together to figure this out."
Diana: "I agree with Alice, we should focus on identifying the mafioso to ensure everyone's safety. Let's share any suspicious information we may have and work together as a team."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
